name: English teacher
description:
English Teacher for kids

The Federal chain of bilingual kindergartens is looking for a perfect English teacher for kids.

We are the biggest chain of bilingual kidergardens in Russia and for now we have 90 working kindergardens in Moscow and many other regions of Russia.

All our new teachers study how to use Sun School methodology in work (we have classes and web-classes where you can learn different aspects of our methodology).

We make your work easier: for every lesson we have detailed curruculum with concrete exercises.

Responsibilities:

- play with children teaching them English;

- take care of kids, control them (with an assistant who works with you during all your work time).

Requirements:

- experience of teaching kids aged under 6 years old, teaching in groups is more preferable;

- English native speaker (clear speech)

- love children, know how to communicate with them effectively.

We guarantee :

- competitive salary and timely payments;

- stability of a big company;

- opportunity to improve yourself;

- 7-15 kids in a group;

- assistant (babysitter) works in your group all the time.

Schedule: Monday-Friday, 15:00-19:15
